channel.title: Frozen but still using Melee? [TOUGH]
channel.description: Hello! I have a "major" pking problem. Say you freeze someone, and walk away(more than one square away) the person frozen can attack you with melee still which ruins many methods of pking. If anyone could help me I would appreciate it very much, Thanks.

item.title: Frozen but still using Melee? [TOUGH]
item.dc:creator: @Phineas Phineas
item.description:
@Phineas wrote:

Maybe search something like “magetimer” in client.java or search barrage, and if you see some sort of barrage timer, make it what you want.

Read full topic
